snippet: Maria Sharapova reached the semifinals of the WTA Finals and sent Flavia Pennetta, this year’s United States Open champion, into retirement with a 7-5, 6-1 win.
abstract: Maria Sharapova defeats Flavia Pennetta to advance to WTA Finals; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova reached the semifinals of the WTA Finals and sent Flavia Pennetta, this year’s United States Open champion, into retirement with a 7-5, 6-1 win.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Tennis; U.S. Open Winner Plays Last Match
headline.main: U.S. Open Champion Plays Last Match
